var f = (tf1.text as NSString).floatValue

//数字转字符串
var f = 123.32342342
var s = String(format: "%.2f", f) //123.32
let i = 255
let s:String = String(format: "%x", i) //ff
let i = 255
let s:String = String(format: "%06x", i) //0000ff
